name: Harvestracks
description:
HOW TO PLAY

growing CARROTS is super easy!
i can explain but quickly, have carrots to tend to

ok, first, WATER carrots!
just press the key next to the sprinklers, they go psh psh psh, done, carrots ready
then, you gotta harvest carrots with WAGONS!
press key next to railway switches, clac clac, wagons directed to carrots
more carrots, more FUNDS!
go fast, because funds are always dropping!

sorry gotta go good luck bye

CREDITS

Game by Luc Deligne, created with Aseprite & Godot
Made for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam in 72h under the theme Harvest.
